item.title: Siddharth corrects Boney Kapoor as he calls Jr NTR a 'new face': 'You are talking about one of the bigges - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Siddharth Corrects Boney Kapoor on Jr NTR's Star Status

Publication Date: Available upon access

Source: Available upon access

In a recent exchange, actor Siddharth responded to Boney Kapoor, who referred to Jr NTR as a 'new face' in the industry, emphasizing Jr NTR's stature as one of the biggest superstars in cinema.

  • Siddharth pointed out the established status of Jr NTR in the film industry.
  • Boney Kapoor's comments seem to downplay Jr NTR's long-standing career.
  • The discussion highlights the recognition and respect given to established actors in the industry.
‚ÄúYou are talking about one of the biggest superstars in the industry,‚Äù Siddharth emphasized.

This exchange sheds light on the understanding and acknowledgment of veteran actors in the film sector, showcasing the importance of recognizing their contributions.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Day 27: Only 100 Crores Away From Baahubali 2, Will Allu Arjun‚Äôs Film Rewrite History? - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Day 27: Only 100 Crores Away From Baahubali 2

Publication date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

The action thriller Pushpa 2 is experiencing an exceptional run at the box office, nearing the 1700 crore mark after 27 days. The film features Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil and is set to potentially rewrite history by competing with Baahubali 2.

Key Points:

  • The film earned 8.55 crores net on day 27, making the domestic total reach 1195.20 crores net.
  • Pushpa 2's global total currently stands at 1699.58 crores.
  • It is just 100 crores away from surpassing Baahubali 2's lifetime earnings of 1800 crores.
  • Pushpa 2 may become the first Indian film to cross the 1200 crore net mark.
‚ÄúOnly time will tell if Pushpa 2 will beat Baahubali 2.‚Äù

With an impressive box office performance, it appears that Pushpa 2 may join the ranks of the highest-grossing Indian films, with its final earnings to be influenced by the post-holiday momentum.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 8 (Early Trends): Shows 27% Growth On New Year But That‚Äôs Peanuts Compared To Pushpa 2 - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 8: Shows 27% Growth on New Year

Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Varun Dhawan and Keerthy Suresh's film 'Baby John' is struggling at the box office, showing slight growth during the New Year but still facing significant challenges compared to competitors.

Key Points:

  • Day 8 saw a 27% growth, earning 2.75 crores compared to the previous day.
  • Total first-week earnings are estimated at 36.03 crores.
  • The film is trailing behind other major releases like 'Pushpa 2' and 'Mufasa: The Lion King'.
  • Future projections suggest an eventual box office total of around 60 crores.
‚ÄúBaby John has badly gotten sandwiched between Pushpa 2 and Mufasa: The Lion King.‚Äù

Despite a slight increase in earnings during the holiday season, the overall performance of 'Baby John' has left both audiences and makers disappointed.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 28: Allu Arjun film kicks off new year in style, crosses ‚Çπ1180 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office Collection Day 28: Allu Arjun Film Kicks Off New Year in Style, Crosses ‚Çπ1180 Crore

Jan 01, 2025 - Hindustan Times

The Allu Arjun-starrer 'Pushpa 2 The Rule' continues its box office dominance, crossing the ‚Çπ1180 crore mark on its 28th day despite being in its fourth week. The film showed growth on New Year's Day, with collections of ‚Çπ13.1 crore. Directed by Sukumar, the action drama has had a massive opening weekend and maintained strong collections in its subsequent weeks.

  • The film has collected ‚Çπ1184.6 crore in total.
  • It had a massive opening weekend with ‚Çπ725.8 crore.
  • The film has a star-studded cast including Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil.
  • A sequel, 'Pushpa 2: The Rampage', has been announced.
The incident has brought unwanted attention to the film and its lead actor, Allu Arjun, who was arrested and released on bail following a stampede at the film's premiere that left a woman dead and a child injured.

The film's success has been a major talking point in the Telugu film industry, with its box office collections drawing comparisons to other successful films like 'Dangal'.

item.title: Exclusive| Sajid Khan: I have thought of ending my life many times in the last six years - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sajid Khan Reflects on Life After #MeToo Allegations: A Journey Through Darkness

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sajid Khan talks about the toll of the #MeToo allegations on his life and career, revealing his struggles and thoughts of suicide over the past six years.

  • Harassment allegations in 2018 disrupted Khan's career and personal life.
  • He reflects on the mental health challenges and financial hardships following the allegations.
  • Khan mentions that he has learned from his past and seeks to return to the film industry.
  • Despite the pain, he professes no animosity towards others involved in the #MeToo movement.
  • Khan expresses a desire to entertain again and acknowledges the struggle of overcoming public scrutiny.
‚ÄúI thought of ending my life many times in the last 6 years.‚Äù

In conclusion, Sajid Khan's experience serves as a reminder of the deep impacts of public allegations and the journey towards healing and renewal in the face of adversity.

item.title: Pride of Tollywood to launch Ram Charan‚Äôs Game Changer trailer - 123telugu
item.description:
SS Rajamouli to Launch Ram Charan's 'Game Changer' Trailer

Published on Jan 1, 2025 - 123telugu

Get ready for an exciting movie event! Megapower Star Ram Charan's political action drama, 'Game Changer', is set for a massive release on January 10, 2025. Directed by maverick filmmaker Shankar, making his Telugu debut, the movie is the first Sankranthi film to hit the screens this year. The film's trailer, scheduled to launch tomorrow at 05:04 PM, will now be unveiled by none other than Tollywood's pride, SS Rajamouli.

Rajamouli, who shares a great rapport with Ram Charan, will be the chief guest at the trailer launch event in Hyderabad. The event promises to be a treat for movie buffs, as two of South Indian cinema's most celebrated directors come together on one stage. 'Game Changer', produced by Dil Raju on a massive budget, also stars Kiara Advani, SJ Suryah, Srikanth, Anjali, and Jayaram in key roles.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh reveals why she is still wearing turmeric thread instead of gold mangalsutra after marriage - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh Explains Why She's Still Wearing Turmeric Thread Instead of Gold Mangalsutra After Marriage

Date & Source: Jan 01, 2025 - Hindustan Times

Keerthy Suresh, the Tamil film actor, has been spotted wearing a turmeric thread around her neck instead of a gold mangalsutra since her marriage to long-time boyfriend Antony Thattil on December 12, 2024. In several public appearances post-wedding, including promotions for her film 'Baby John', Keerthy has been seen wearing the sacred thread. In a recent interview with Galatta India, Keerthy revealed the reason behind this choice.

  1. Keerthy is wearing the turmeric thread as per tradition, which should not be removed until a certain date after marriage.
  2. She plans to change it to a gold chain on an auspicious date later in January.
  3. Keerthy chose to wear the thread openly as it is considered sacred and powerful, and she liked how it looked with her promotional outfits.
"There's a reason behind why I am wearing it to every promotion... I will be wearing till then. Somebody even told me that if you don't want to wear it with your promotional clothes... the reason why it is tied here is also because it should touch your chest. It is sacred and also supposed to be very powerful. Once you change it to the golden chain, it is going to look normal. Some said that I can even put it inside but I thought it looked hot! I am happy that I am flaunting it."

After her wedding, Keerthy shared pictures from her D-Day on Instagram, captioned '#ForTheLoveOfNyke'.

Baby John, directed by Kalees and presented by Atlee, released in cinemas on Christmas. The film also stars Wamiqa Gabbi, Jackie Shroff, Rajpal Yadav, and Salman Khan in a cameo.

item.title: Sujoy Ghosh to team up with Shahid Kapoor post exit from Shah Rukh Khan starrer King? Here‚Äôs what we know! - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Sujoy Ghosh to team up with Shahid Kapoor post exit from Shah Rukh Khan starrer King? Here‚Äôs what we know!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Bollywood actor Shahid Kapoor and acclaimed director Sujoy Ghosh are reportedly aligning their schedules to collaborate on a new thriller project, although no official confirmation has been made yet.

  • Shahid and Sujoy are prioritizing their schedules to bring the project to fruition.
  • A source indicated that Shahid had previously shown interest in the script, but timing was an issue.
  • The project promises a suspenseful narrative, reflecting Sujoy Ghosh's filmmaking style.
  • Shahid Kapoor's recent works include the digital series Farzi and the film Bloody Daddy.
  • His upcoming film, Deva, is set for release on January 31, 2025.
‚ÄúShahid was interested in the script earlier, but the timing wasn‚Äôt right. Now, both Sujoy and he are making it a priority to align their schedules and bring it to life.‚Äù

The speculation continues as Shahid's team has denied any current negotiations for a new film with Sujoy Ghosh, creating anticipation among fans for what might come next.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: SS Rajamouli and Mahesh Babu enter into backend deal for SSMB 29; Two part saga in 2027 & 2029 - PINKVILLA
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: SS Rajamouli and Mahesh Babu enter into backend deal for SSMB 29; Two part saga in 2027 & 2029

Published on Jan 01, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

SS Rajamouli and Mahesh Babu have entered into a backend deal for their upcoming project, SSMB 29, which is set to be a two-part jungle adventure film. Filming is expected to begin in April 2025, with a planned release in 2027 and 2029.

  • Mahesh Babu and Priyanka Chopra will star as the lead pair, with Prithviraj Sukumar playing the antagonist.
  • The project aims to reinvent the jungle adventure genre, combining elements of thrill and espionage.
  • The estimated budget for SSMB 29 is approximately Rs 1000 crore, aiming to be one of the most expensive films in Indian cinema.
  • Rajamouli and Babu have agreed to a 40% profit-sharing model instead of traditional upfront fees to maximize funding for the film.
  • A global studio partnership is in discussion, potentially with Sony or Disney.
‚ÄúSS Rajamouli has faith in his craft and Mahesh Babu is trusting his stardom.‚Äù

The collaboration between Rajamouli and Babu signals a strong commitment to creating a legacy for Indian cinema, with high expectations from audiences for this ambitious project.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh reveals the timeline of her relationship with Antony Thattil: ‚ÄòI was in 12th; he is 7 years older‚Äô - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh reveals the timeline of her relationship with Antony Thattil: ‚ÄòI was in 12th; he is 7 years older‚Äô

Date: January 01, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Keerthy Suresh married her long-time boyfriend Antony Thattil on December 12, 2024. In her first interview about their relationship, she revealed the timeline of their dating life, which lasted 15 years.

  • Keerthy initiated their relationship while in 12th grade; Antony is seven years older.
  • The couple dated long-distance for six years while Antony was working in Qatar.
  • She received a promise ring in 2010, which she wore until their wedding.
  • Keerthy expressed that their wedding was a dream come true after many years of planning.
  • She highlighted Antony's support for her career, emphasizing her feelings of luck in their partnership.
‚ÄúMy heart was full, it was an emotional moment for us. We‚Äôve always wanted this.‚Äù - Keerthy Suresh

Keerthy is currently involved in upcoming films, including Revolver Rita and Kannivedi, after making her Hindi debut in the film Baby John.

item.description:
Sonakshi Sinha Calls Husband Zaheer Iqbal ‚ÄòVery Irritating‚Äô; He Says, ‚ÄòI Need Help. My Wife Wants‚Ä¶‚Äô

Date: January 02, 2025

Source: News18

Bollywood actress Sonakshi Sinha humorously expressed her annoyance towards her husband Zaheer Iqbal‚Äôs antics. Sonakshi recently shared a light-hearted video on Instagram, teasing Zaheer for his behavior.

  • Sonakshi recently attended the Boxing Day Test between India and Australia at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.
  • She posted an Instagram Story featuring Zaheer teasing her about her love for long camera shots.
  • The couple tied the knot on June 23 after dating for seven years.
  • Sonakshi made her film debut in Dabangg, while Zaheer debuted in Notebook.
‚ÄúYou are a VVIP, very very irritating person,‚Äù wrote Sonakshi about Zaheer's playful teasing.

This playful exchange highlights the couple's affectionate relationship and gives fans a glimpse of their life together.

item.title: Retro: Suriya drops new poster of Karthik Subbaraj's gangster film, his next after Kanguva - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Suriya's 'Retro' Poster: A New Year's Teaser of His Upcoming Gangster Film

Published on Jan 01, 2025 07:24 PM IST
Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Suriya kicked off the New Year by unveiling a new poster of his upcoming film 'Retro', directed by Karthik Subbaraj. Suriya, who was last seen in the action fantasy epic 'Kanguva', shared the poster on his social media account, captioning it with warm wishes for the New Year.

  • In the poster, Suriya is seen in a stylish avatar, standing beside his car on an open field.
  • The film is described as a gangster film with elements of action and romance.
  • The tagline of the film is 'Love, Laughter and War'.
  • The film has music composed by Santhosh Narayanan, cinematography handled by Shreyaas Krishna, and editing by Shafique Mohamed Ali.
  • The teaser of the film was released last week on Christmas, showcasing Suriya's character transformation from a gangster to a lover.
Suriya's character in the teaser: ‚ÄúI will control my temper... Violence, rowdyism, and hooliganism... will quit everything from this moment. Will try to smile and be happy. The purpose of my birth... is love. Pure love. That's it.‚Äù

Suriya's previous film 'Kanguva' received mixed reactions from fans, with some praising his performance while others criticized the film's sound mix and direction.

item.title: Salman Khan‚Äôs ex-girlfriend takes a dig at him - 123telugu
item.description:
Sangeeta Bijlani Opens Up About Past Relationship with Salman Khan

Published on: January 1, 2025, Source: 123telugu.com

Sangeeta Bijlani, a former model and actress, has revealed details about her past relationship with actor Salman Khan. The two were engaged to be married, but Salman called off the wedding just days before the ceremony.

  • Sangeeta shared that Salman was upset with her for wearing modern dresses and had a conservative outlook.
  • The couple's differing views on lifestyle created tension in their relationship.
  • Despite the breakup, Sangeeta remains close to Salman and his family.
Sangeeta Bijlani: "...he wasn't comfortable with my modern lifestyle..."

Sangeeta made these comments on the Hindi singing show Indian Idol.

item.title: Deva: Makers drop electrifying First Poster of Shahid Kapoor with an Amitabh Bachchan connection - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Deva: Makers Drop Electrifying First Poster of Shahid Kapoor with Amitabh Bachchan Connection

Date & Source: January 2025, Bollywood Hungama

Zee Studios and Roy Kapur Films‚Äô upcoming action-packed thriller Deva has unveiled an electrifying new poster featuring Shahid Kapoor as a cop, with a background sketch of Amitabh Bachchan from his iconic 70s and 80s era. The film, directed by Rosshan Andrrews, stars Shahid Kapoor and Pooja Hegde, with Pavail Gulati and Kubbra Sait in key roles. It is set to release on January 31, 2025.

  • Shahid Kapoor's fierce look in the poster has generated excitement among fans.
  • The poster features a background sketch of Amitabh Bachchan, adding a layer of nostalgia.
  • The film's release date has been locked for January 31, 2025.

Conclusion: The poster of Deva promises an intense cinematic experience, leaving fans eager for more details.

Published on January 01, 2025, 16:43 IST

Actress Ileana D'Cruz has sparked pregnancy rumors with her New Year post. In a compilation video shared on Instagram, a clip from October shows Ileana getting emotional and flaunting a pregnancy test kit. Fans are speculating that she may be expecting her second child with husband Michael Dolan.

  1. Ileana D'Cruz shared a New Year post on Instagram.
  2. In the post, she showcased a pregnancy test kit in an October clip.
  3. Fans are assuming she might be pregnant with her second child.

Are you pregnant again üòç
Wait‚Ä¶October‚Ä¶congratulations again!!! üôåüèæüôåüèæüôåüèæ

item.title: Salman Khan Didn't 'Allow' Sangeeta Bijlani To Wear Short Clothes, Actress Says 'I'm Not Afraid Now' - News18
item.description:
Salman Khan Didn't 'Allow' Sangeeta Bijlani To Wear Short Clothes, Actress Says 'I'm Not Afraid Now'

Date & Source: January 01, 2025, 16:30 IST - News18

Sangeeta Bijlani, a former Bollywood actress, recently revealed that during her relationship with Salman Khan, he didn't allow her to wear short clothes.

In an appearance on Indian Idol 15, when asked if she would have changed something in her career, she said, "Jo the na (mimics Salman) humare ex, I was very constricted. Matlab kapde yeh nahi pehanna, itne short nahi hone chahiye. Itna long hona chahiye, voh gale main‚Ä¶ I could not wear this kind of dress. Initially, I did but then I was not allowed to. So I was shy then, abhi main aisi nahi hoon. Abhi poori gundi hoon. I‚Äôm not afraid now, I was reserved then."

  1. Sangeeta Bijlani opens up about her relationship with Salman Khan.
  2. She revealed that Salman didn't allow her to wear short clothes during their relationship.
  3. She mimicked Salman's way of speaking to emphasize her point.
  4. Sangeeta and Salman's relationship lasted nearly a decade and was one of Bollywood's most adored couples.
  5. Despite their breakup, they managed to maintain a cordial and respectful bond.
  6. Sangeeta married cricketer Mohammad Azharuddin in 1996, and they finalized their divorce in 2019.
  7. Sangeeta and Salman remained in touch, showcasing their enduring friendship.
"Connections don‚Äôt break... Connections never go away. The love between your partners, school friends never goes away." - Sangeeta Bijlani

Conclusion: Sangeeta Bijlani shared a personal aspect of her past relationship with Salman Khan, revealing that he didn't allow her to wear short clothes. Despite their breakup, they maintained a friendly bond.

item.title: Anant Ambani wears expensive ice-cube like watch that has only 3 pieces in world, it is worth Rs... - India.com

Anant Ambani's Luxurious Watch Collection: A Rare Richard Mille Timepiece

Date: 2025-01-01 | Source: India.com

Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani‚Äôs youngest son, Anant Ambani, is known for his opulent watch collection. Recently, he was spotted wearing a limited edition Richard Mille RM 52-04 ‚ÄúSkull‚Äù Blue Sapphire watch, one of only three pieces made. This rare timepiece is priced at around Rs 22 crore.

Main Points:

  1. The Richard Mille RM 52-04 ‚ÄúSkull‚Äù Blue Sapphire is one of only three pieces made.

  3. He gifted expensive watches to his groom squad during his wedding.

item.title: ‚ÄòVidaa Muyarchi‚Äô was suggested by Ajith Kumar: Magizhi Thirumeni interview - The Hindu
item.description:
Magizh Thirumeni Discusses Directing Ajith Kumar in 'Vidaa Muyarchi'

Published: January 01, 2025 04:44 pm IST

The filmmaker Magizh Thirumeni opens up about his first-time collaboration with superstar Ajith Kumar for the film 'Vidaa Muyarchi', revealing insights into their creative partnership and the risks involved in choosing unconventional storytelling.

  • Magizh Thirumeni has waited over 15 years to direct Ajith Kumar, known for his commercial action films.
  • For the first time, Magizh is directing a film based on someone else's story, as suggested by Ajith.
  • This film marks a departure from Ajith's typical heroic roles, portraying him as a common man.
  • Ajith insists on creating a 'sensible film' rather than following conventional commercial norms.
  • The production faced challenges when Ajith was involved in a car accident during filming in Azerbaijan.
‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt go so far as to say that this film is present in a Magizh Thirumeni world...because the source material is not mine,‚Äù - Magizh Thirumeni.

The collaboration is viewed as a significant shift in Tamil cinema, as it embraces a purer genre approach over commercial blending, with high expectations for audience reception.

item.title: Mouni Roy trips and falls on pavement after celebrating New Year with Disha Patani; husband Suraj Nambiar picks her up - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mouni Roy trips and falls on pavement after celebrating New Year with Disha Patani; husband Suraj Nambiar picks her up

Date: Jan 01, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Mouni Roy took a tumble while exiting a New Year's Party in Mumbai, accompanied by her husband Suraj Nambiar and friend Disha Patani. Surrounded by paparazzi, Mouni lost her balance and fell on the pavement, but Suraj quickly helped her up.

  • Mouni was seen falling while leaving a New Year's party with Suraj and Disha.
  • Suraj held her hand to help her get up as the paparazzi clicked pictures.
  • Fans expressed concern for Mouni and criticized the paparazzi's invasiveness.
  • Mouni and Disha have been friends since participating in The Entertainers Tour together.
  • Mouni's recent work includes a series on Disney+ Hotstar and an upcoming film scheduled for 2025.
‚ÄúHope she is okay.‚Äù

In conclusion, Mouni's fall highlights the challenges celebrities face with paparazzi attention, but also shows the support of friends and family during unexpected situations.

item.title: Sameer Wankhede denies leaking Shah Rukh Khan‚Äôs chats, defends Aryan Khan‚Äôs arrest - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sameer Wankhede denies leaking Shah Rukh Khan‚Äôs chats, defends Aryan Khan‚Äôs arrest

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Times of India

In a recent interview, Sameer Wankhede, the former Zonal Director of the Narcotics Control Bureau (NCB), addressed the ongoing controversy surrounding his investigation into Aryan Khan's alleged involvement in a drug racket, defending his actions and responding to various allegations.

  • Wankhede denied leaking chats involving Shah Rukh Khan.
  • He defended his professional conduct during the investigation and the arrest of Aryan Khan.
  • Aryan Khan was released on bail after 25 days in jail and later cleared of all charges.
  • Wankhede faced allegations of receiving a bribe, which he refuted.
  • He emphasized the importance of equal treatment under the law, regardless of fame.
‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think I arrested a kid. At 23, Bhagat Singh gave his life for the country.‚Äù - Sameer Wankhede

In conclusion, Wankhede stated he has no regrets about his role in the case and emphasized his commitment to uphold the law, despite facing significant public and media scrutiny.
